refnamediv.refpurpose: Utility program for separating email messages into tokens

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Bogolexer is part of the bogofilter Bayesian spam filter package.
It is used to separate messages into tokens and to test new versions of the lexer.l code.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: The -p option tells bogolexer to print just the tokens read from stdin, without any extra messages.
The -q option tells bogolexer to print a token count, without printing the actual tokens.
The -h option prints the help message and exits.
